summary: Tested Cart V2 + Side Drawer + Mini Cart Animation functionality. UI components work correctly but critical API integration issues prevent cart items from displaying and updating properly.

critical_bugs.issue: Frontend cart API calls don't match backend endpoints - POST /cart/items vs /cart/add, DELETE /cart/items/{id} vs /cart/{product_id}
critical_bugs.impact: Cart items cannot be added/removed from frontend, breaking core cart functionality

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cartAPI.addItem calls POST /cart/items but backend expects POST /cart/add
Frontend cartAPI.removeItem calls DELETE /cart/items/{id} but backend expects DELETE /cart/{product_id}

ui_bugs.issue: Cart badge not showing item count after adding products

integration_issues.issue: Cart items not displaying in drawer after adding products due to API mismatch
Total price not calculated/displayed due to empty cart state

passed_tests: Mini cart icon displays in header
Cart drawer opens with slide animation
Cart drawer closes with X button
Cart drawer closes with backdrop click
Cart drawer closes with Escape key
Backend GET /cart API returns data structure
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix API endpoint mismatch - Update frontend cartAPI endpoints to match backend routes OR update backend routes to match frontend calls. Frontend calls /cart/items but backend has /cart/add. Frontend calls /cart/items/{id} but backend has /cart/{product_id}. This breaks all cart add/remove functionality.
